Happy New Years BTS💕🎉
I really enjoyed the ride with during this period of 2018.
You really made me view life at a different perspective and you have taught me so much. I can do or say anything to repay what you have made me become. You helped me realise that being myself is okay and that loving myself is not being selfish but being respectful and aware of my own feelings, thoughts and well-being. Thank you for always being by my side while I went through the ups and downs of my life. Thank you for being the shoulder that I can cry on. Thank you for making me feel not alone when I go through hardship, break up, depression and pain. Thank you for being my friend, my teacher, my brother, my idol, my lover and my family. I really hope we can do good and spread it to the world in 2019

I love you BTS, 
Happy New Years💕🎊
